util.xmltool
Class XMLTool

java.lang.Object
  util.xmltool.XMLTool

public abstract class XMLTool
extends java.lang.Object

A support class with static methods which generate basic XML elements and structures.

Author:
Gerben G. Meyer

getValuesRecursively

public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getValuesRecursively(KeyDataVector props,
                                                                      java.lang.String key,
                                                                      boolean removeValueTag)
Used to recursively search a KeyDataVector for the values with the given identifier. The root tag may be excluded from the search by setting the removeValueTag boolean.

Parameters:
props - the data collection
key - the identifier of the KeyData
removeValueTag - exclude root tag
Returns:
the results
